title: Andrea del Sarto - the speaker blames "you" for

content.question: In lines 15-30, the speaker blames “you” (line 15) for not

choices.label: coming to his aid in despair
encouraging him to fulfill a higher vision

content.answer: encouraging him to fulfill a higher vision

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
